msbt.message: I have something superduper cool to show you, but you gotta guess what it is first. A huh huh huh! Oh, I'll just tell ya. It's my very own sparkler, ! Cool, right?And guess what! I got one for you too, !
I love those thingies! Like, a lot. But I should probably limit myself, so I'm happy to share, . I know you'll love those thingies too.
Looks like your pockets are full right now, so how 'bout I hold onto this until you've got more room. Don't worry. It's safe here with me.
